You plan to visit 5 European cities for 27 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You would like to visit Lisbon for 4 days. You plan to stay in Milan for 7 days. You want to spend 7 days in Santorini. During day 10 and day 16, you have to attend a conference in Santorini. You would like to visit London for 6 days. You would like to meet your friends at London between day 16 and day 21 to tour together. You want to spend 7 days in Lyon.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Lisbon and Lyon, Santorini and London, Milan and Santorini, Lisbon and Milan, London and Lyon, Lisbon and London, Milan and London.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 27 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
